unnormalised: Weather impacting yields, eh? Tell me about it! My grandfather in Punjab, he always said, "Monsoon is the real king, not us!". Remember that crazy hailstorm on 20/04/2023? Wiped out the entire mango crop in UP. Even the IARI guys are scratching their heads, na? Hope they find some solutions quick, or else prices of dal will shoot up past Rs. 200 by 10/10/2024. Jai Kisan! Another bad year and many folks will have to move to Mumbai by 05:00 hrs to find work.
normalised: Weather impacting yields, eh? Tell me about it! My grandfather in Punjab, he always said, "Monsoon is the real king, not us!". Remember that crazy hailstorm on twentieth april two thousand and twenty three? Wiped out the entire mango crop in U P. Even the I A R I guys are scratching their heads, na? Hope they find some solutions quick, or else prices of dal will shoot up past rupee two hundred by tenth october two thousand and twenty four. Jai Kisan! Another bad year and many folks will have to move to Mumbai by zero five zero zero hours to find work.
